com.capricorn.view

Class MultiGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • com.capricorn.view.MultiGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MultiGame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    MultiGame is designed by JFrame and be designed to let players join the game. It is main board of the game in order to communication with server and players as a boundary
    Author:
    Chen Li, Tianyu Wu, Yu Li
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
